page.title: 16WILMCOTE SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content: We have a{minibus}with a seat capacity of 15 including the driver. There is a shed where childrens bikes are kept, and a games shed where footballs, rounders bats and cricket bats etc are kept.There are four{teachers}and one helper.There are two cooks and two playground duty ladies.There is 1 music teacher.{Parents}help with sewing and cookery. There are 3 classes, class 1 is sometimes split up into two groups. There are 35 pupils in class 1,26 in class 2 and 21 in class 3.There is a large playground with two climbing frames,two tunnels, two netball posts and goalposts. We study{Mathematics,Language Work,}which includes Story Writing,English and Topic Work,also{Physical Education.}We play sport at the football pitch,girls often play netball on the playground.
